Job Title:

JD:

Experience: 7+ Years

Location: Bengaluru, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Chennai and Pune




Candidate should be well versed with Treasury and Business Analyst.
We need candidate should have test management experience.
Should have the ability to produce test matrix and management reporting associated with testing.
Ability and experience to interface very senior stakeholders likes of Program Director or Sr Team
Communication skills matter a lot for this role because of the stakeholder visibility.
Treasury domain experience Sr level.




Strong Experience in Group Treasury including the below

- BCBS 239 Regulatory Standards hands-on experience

- Cash Forecasting Automation Experience hands on experience

- ISIP (Systemically Identified Payments) program hands on experience

- Hands on Experience on ILAAP (Internal Liquidity Assessment and Analysis Program)

Strong Ability to interface with Senior Stakeholders (i.e. Managing Director)

Regulatory Reporting hands on Experience (not knowledge)

- Strong hands-on experience on Treasury Regulatory reporting experience (particularly with PRA)

- Strong hands-on experience in implementing regulatory implementation from techno-functional stand point

- Strong hands-on experience on statement of policy with regulators

Strong Domain hands on experience Mandatory (not knowledge)

- Hands on experience on all treasury product lines that work with front office.

Test Management Experience from user experience standpoint (hands on experience not knowledge)

- Ability to manage the entire test life cycle from Treasury Experience

- Work with Treasury Users to understand their issues in testing from Treasury business perspective

- Ability solve treasury business issues including all product lines.
